You open the NextBus app

at 3:40 pm. The app predicts

the next bus will arrive in

20 minutes, or 4:00 pm.

Start a stopwatch.

Let’s say the bus arrives when it was predicted to, at 4:00 pm. Record it as zero minutes late.

If instead, the bus arrived at 4:12 pm, you would record it as 12 minutes late.

-20

-10

0

10

20

Minutes off from prediction

You open the NextBus app at 3:40 pm. The app predicts the next bus will arrive in 20 minutes, or 4:00 pm. Start a stopwatch.

Let’s say the bus arrives when it was predicted to, at 4:00 pm. Record it as zero minutes late.

If instead, the bus arrived at 4:12 pm, you would record it as 12 minutes late.
